subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Saturday was the beginning of a new and challenging season for Andy Pettitte, but it was not a smooth start as Jonny Gomes’s three-run homer powered the Tampa Bay Rays to a victory.
snippet: Saturday was the beginning of a new and challenging season for Andy Pettitte, but it was not a smooth start as Jonny Gomes’s three-run homer powered the Tampa Bay Rays to a victory.
